title: Cookie management not working as it should
content:
Hi,

I use firefox, with synced settings, at both home and my place of work. I try to manage cookies so my Spotify always remains logged it when I open my bookmark. This works on my home computer, but doesn't seem to work on my office computer.

I've looked at the setting and to me they appear the same. I'm only slightly know what I'm doing so any help would be grately appriciated! One system is a Mac and one is a Windows - unsure if that would make any kind of difference.

Thanks, Andrew
creator: andrewmcbroom

title: Ulkádání otevřených souborů ve Firefoxu na síťové disky.
content: Dobrý den, dotaz, přestalo ve Firefoxu fungovat ukládání souborů otevřených na síti. Tzn. otevřu něco ve wordu, excelu a při zavření se mi to neuloží na síť, ale pouze mi to nabídne lokál. Potřebuji ukládat síťově na sdílené disky. Co s tím. Díky J
creator: weiss31

title: Unable to send request at the startup
content: Firefox is unable to send the request at the startup, meaning it's just keep showing loading... and then opens the webpage after a couple of minutes. For example, if I open instagram.com: At the bottom it says, "sending request to www.instagram.com" and it stucks on that for some time as I'm not able to click anywhere in the webpage. And sometimes, it says, "transferring data from www.instagram.com" PC and the internet connection is fine. What could be the issue?
creator: ashishmassey

title: Unable to send request at the startup
content: Firefox is unable to send the request at the startup, meaning it's just keep showing loading... and then opens the webpage after a couple of minutes. PC and the internet connection is fine. What could be the issue?
creator: ashishmassey

title: FireFox Options, Settings and Search are all showing No response , Blank Page
content:
I have tried to Install Firefox Multiple Times. Firefox doesn't retrieve any pages when searched (Example:google.com). Even the Settings option is not opening. It is all blank Page.

Tried various options like Refresh, trouble shoot mode, Restarting, System Updates, Uninstalling Visual Studio, Changing Proxy. Nothing works. Kindly help on this solution.
creator: sruthi.krishnan2696

title: search results appear in the address field instead of the search field in the centre of the home page
content: Folks, Is there any way to get FireFox to return search results to the search field under the FireFox logo in the home page. Regards Bob
creator: u4256169

title: SpeechRecognition on Firefox
content:
Hi, I am trying to use SpeechRecognition on Firefox. However, it is giving the following errors:

error: network message: Error connecting to the service.

I have enabled the the: 

media.webspeech.recognition.enable  -> true media.webspeech.recognition.force_enable. -> true

Any support is appreciated.
creator: rayniloy

title: How to Disable Web Page Auto-Refresh (blockautorefresh )
content:
about:config accessibility.blockautorefresh true I set it up like this. But the site below was useless.

https://www.filetender.com/ When I receive the file here (Magnet file)

With time... The website will be moved to the site at the link below. https://www.uuoobe.kr/main.php?ref=ten

ublock-origin I use this but I couldn't block the site from changing.
